title: Aen 5 12-14 - SS sight - line 1 - Styl - synchysis

content.description:
A Helmsman Spots Trouble in the Skies

Ipse gubernatorgubernator, -oris, m.: helmsman puppipuppis, -is, f. = navis, -is PalinurusPalinurus, -i, m.: Palinurus (a companion of Aeneas) ab alta: 
“Heuheu, interj.: alas quianamquianam, adv. = cur tanti cinxerunt aethera nimbinimbus, -i, m. = nubes, -is? 
Quidve, pater Neptune, paras?”
content.question: Which of the following stylistic devices occurs in line 1 (ipse...alta)?

unit.text: 6: Course Project and Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry

skill.text: 2.A: Describe features and functions of stylistic elements in Latin texts.
